metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000344 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DHIESimplementation allowed the use of ECB mode. This mode is regarded as unsafeand support for it has been removed from the provider.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000344` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbcjmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcpg-java - 1.60-1
libbcpkix-java - 1.60-1
libbcprov-java - 1.60-1
libbctls-java - 1.60-1
libbcutil-java - 1.60-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
